items.sentence: I can\'t believe I actually thought Tom would change.
I\'ve already forgotten what you told me I should do.
Tom won\'t know how to use it if you don\'t show him.
I didn\'t know that we weren\'t supposed to help Tom.
I had to start supporting myself when I was thirteen.
I just wanted to let you know I can\'t do that today.
What\'s the difference between boiling and simmering?
What\'s the scariest thing that ever happened to you?
Tom didn\'t recognize the person sitting next to him.
Tom didn\'t seem to be having any trouble doing that.
I\'m the guy who showed Tom how to make tomato sauce.
I\'ve already told the police everything that I know.
Mary walked through the living room in her pink robe.
You\'re responsible for everything that has happened.
You\'re the only other person who knows where Tom is.
Tom ended up not getting paid as much as he expected.
He narrowly escaped from the bus when it caught fire.
Tom wasn\'t told why Mary wasn\'t allowed to see him.
Tom wouldn\'t have made it on time if he hadn\'t run.
How old were you when you started playing the guitar?
